toolkits: PIC micro-controllers; two-axis accelerometer; ball switch; RFM interface for wireless communication
contribution_desc: Smart-Its Friends are small building blocks that can be connected and communicate with each other, for example to detect if two blocks are in proximity.
use_cases_desc:
Smart-Its Friends: notifies a user with a beep when a friend connects or leaves to support awareness.

Child monitor: similar to Smart-Its friends, which will notify parents when a child gets out of reach.

Attaching Smart-Its Friends to personal objects, e.g., to invalidate them when they get lost (credit card)
